statements: SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_id FROM customer_subscriptions ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, renewal_date, usage_stats FROM customer_subscriptions ORDER BY renewal_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, usage_stats->'total_usage' AS total_usage FROM customer_subscriptions;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE subscription_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, renewal_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_subscriptions FROM customer_subscriptions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT customer_id, SUM((usage_stats ->> 'data_used')::INT) AS total_data_used FROM customer_subscriptions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_data_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, renewal_date FROM customers ORDER BY renewal_date DESC
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE is_active = True
SELECT customer_name, total_usage FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_type FROM customers WHERE subscription_type = 'premium';
SELECT customer_id, subscription_type, renewal_date FROM customers ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_type, usage_statistics FROM customers WHERE JSON_VALUE(usage_statistics, '$.usage_type') = 'premium';
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, s.start_date, s.end_date FROM customers c JOIN subscriptions s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_id, renewal_date FROM customer_subscriptions ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT subscription_id, renewal_date FROM renewal_dates WHERE renewal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, renewal_date FROM customer_subscriptions JOIN renewal_dates ON customer_subscriptions.subscription_id = renewal_dates.subscription_id;
SELECT subscription_id, SUM(usage_count) AS total_usage FROM usage_statistics GROUP BY subscription_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscriptions
SELECT subscription_id, renewal_date FROM renewal_dates
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(subscription_id) AS subscription_count FROM customer_subscriptions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, subscription_id, renewal_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM usage_statistics ORDER BY usage_count DESC, usage_date
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_type='Premium';
SELECT customer_name, email, subscription_type FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, subscriptions.start_date, billing.amount FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id JOIN billing ON subscriptions.subscription_id = billing.subscription_id;
SELECT SUM(usage_count) AS total_usage FROM usage_statistics;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_type='Premium';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, start_date, renewal_date FROM customers c JOIN subscriptions s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT s.subscription_id, u.usage_date, u.usage_count FROM subscriptions s LEFT JOIN usage_statistics u ON s.subscription_id = u.subscription_id WHERE u.usage_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, subscription_type FROM customers WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_name, renewal_date FROM customers ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM services WHERE service_type = 'SaaS' ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, subscription_type FROM customers WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, service_name FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id JOIN service_subscriptions ON subscriptions.subscription_id = service_subscriptions.subscription_id JOIN services ON service_subscriptions.service_id = services.service_id WHERE services.service_type = 'cloud';

SELECT customer_name, SUM(usage_count) AS total_usage FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id JOIN usage_statistics ON subscriptions.subscription_id = usage_statistics.subscription_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_usage > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, subscription_type, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS subscription_duration FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id WHERE subscription_type = 'premium';
